name: agdelte
description: Reactive UI Framework with Dependent Types in Agda

scripts.build:all: agda --compile --compile-dir=build examples/Counter.agda && agda --compile --compile-dir=build examples/Timer.agda && agda --compile --compile-dir=build examples/TodoMVC.agda
scripts.typecheck:all: agda src/Agdelte/App.agda && agda examples/Counter.agda && agda examples/Timer.agda && agda examples/TodoMVC.agda
